Interface com.jclark.xml.parse.EntityManager

public interface EntityManager
This interface is used by the parser to access external entities.

See Also:
Parser

open(String, URL, String)
Opens an external entity.

open 
 public abstract OpenEntity open(String systemId,
                                 URL baseURL,
                                 String publicId) throws IOException
Opens an external entity.

Parameters:
systemId - the system identifier specified in the entity declaration
baseURL - the base URL relative to which the system identifier should be resolved; null if no base URL is available
publicId - the public identifier specified in the entity declaration; null if no public identifier was specified
